name: Alien Cafe
description:
"End of The Line"

You can see the bus sign flashing from your seat. You can remember reading your brutally detailed guide to sloth care when you were last awake. Where is this place? No wonder the bus line ends here.

This is a game about my dog (who I am convinced is an alien) as the owner of a coffee shop in area51.

This game was inspired by music for the Games of Symphonies Game Jam. The music is inspired by the song "You have to Hope" by Moondog.

This game also pulls inspiration from the "Public Transportation" theme for the Bitsy Game Jam as well as the Develop for Ukraine Game Jam "Stronger Together".

This game was made in 5 days using Bitsy and Reason. All assets are original.
